text: The U.S. state of Hawaii is divided into two congressional districts () for representation in the United States House of Representatives. ==Current districts and representatives== District Representative Party CPVI Incumbent time in office District map Ed Case (D–Kaneohe) Democratic January 3, 2019 – present Kai Kahele (D-Hilo) Democratic January 3, 2021 – present == Historical and present district boundaries == This is a table of congressional district boundary maps in the State of Hawaii. Year Statewide map 1973–1982 1983–1984 1985–1992 1993–2002 2003–2013 Since 2013 == Related pages == * List of United States congressional districts == References ==
title: Hawaii's congressional districts
